title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Condemned
content: The claustrophobic chaos of Condemned returns this week with boosted payouts for all souls. In it, players must outlast their opponents before the time runs out â€” the last one standing wins, and everyone walks away with 2X GTA$ and RP (4X for GTA+ Members) through October 9.
